tool.name: rnazCluster.pl

param.label: Only consider hits with RNAz class probality P>cutoff
Print a header explaining the fields of the output

tool.help:
Usage: rnazCluster.pl [options] [file]
Options: -c X, --cutoff=X Only consider hits with RNAz class probablility P > X (Default:0.5)
-w, --windows -l, --loci Set these flags to print information for windows and/or loci in the output. By default, both single windows and combined loci are printed.
-d, --header Print a header explaining the fields of the output (see below for a detailed description of the fields).
